Presented a talk on “Research Software Engineering (RSE) Asia Association: Journey and Future Plans” at the 55th meeting of the [Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN55)](https://apan55.apan.net/) during the “Open and Sharing Data Working Group (OSDWG): Asia Pacific Open-Sharing Data and National Research and Education Network (NREN) Open Science” session in Kathmandu, Nepal from March 13-17, 2023.
